problem.markdown:
>>1. The Pulse<< ( ) varies in different parts of the body (x) indicates how well the cardiovascular system is working ( ) indicates how well the tissue absorbs oxygen
>>2) The average pulse rate for an infant is<< ( ) 100 to 120 beats per minute (x) 120 to 160 beats per minute ( ) 80 to 100 beats per minute
>>3) The Pulse monitor uses<< ( ) Red LED ( ) IR LED (x) Both red and IR LED
>>4) Following detector cannot be used to measure light output of an LED<< ( ) LDR ( ) photovoltaic cell (x) zener diode
>>5) Which one of the factors listed below does not affect the pulse rate?<< (x) Food ( ) Age ( ) Stress/Exercise

choicegroup.label: 1. The Pulse
choicegroup.choice: varies in different parts of the body
indicates how well the cardiovascular system is working
indicates how well the tissue absorbs oxygen
